actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1970 to require additional reports of export sales of certain agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1970 to require export sales reports on any contract entered into by a foreign subsidiary or affiliate of an exporter obliged to make such reports on its own contracts, when the subsidiary's or affiliate's contract involves the exportation from the United States of a substantial quantity of specified agricultural commodities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1970 to require additional reports of export sales of certain agricultural commodities.
